name: Good Men are Hard to Find
name_original: Good Men are Hard to Find
description:
!!WARNING!!
Due to WebGL causing
gameplay issues, I made a downloadable version.
This version works as intended. Have fun!

You are summoned as a vassal to perform sacrificial acts of murder on the civilians of the island. However, nobody knows how to cook, everyone is starving, lost, confused. Your God only accept healthy, well fed individuals for his ritual. Therefore, you must help the various people to strive and fix their problems in order to... well. you know.

Made for the Github GameOff Jam.
source link (its a mess) : https://github.com/pirhanalabs/A-Good-Man-Is-Hard-To-Find-II

Code, Art and Game Design: Pirhana 
Music and Sound effects : Marian Walczak
